Class.ClassComment: BeginTask /** * Marks a method as causing a jBPM {@link org.jbpm.taskmgmt.exe.TaskInstance task}to be resumed. The jBPM {@link org.jbpm.context.exe.ContextInstance} is associated with the BUSINESS_PROCESS scope and the {@link org.jbpm.taskmgmt.exe.TaskInstance} is associated with a newconversation, unless the annotated method returns a null outcome. <p/> Note that both {@link BeginTask} and {@link StartTask} have effectbefore invocation of the intercepted method in that they are both about setting up appropriate {@link org.jbpm.context.exe.ContextInstance}for the current {@link org.jboss.seam.contexts.BusinessProcessContext}. <p/> * @author Steve Ebersole */
